inventory=[{"type": "iron_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "sand", "quantity": 2, "index": 16}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral_fan", "quantity": 29, "index": 20}, {"type": "shield", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "honeycomb", "quantity": 2, "index": 28}, {"type": "magenta_banner", "quantity": 5, "index": 29}, {"type": "conduit", "quantity": 48, "index": 31}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 2, "index": 39}, {"type": "bone_meal", "quantity": 43, "index": 40}, {"type": "grass_block", "quantity": 31, "index": 42}, {"type": "gunpowder", "quantity": 5, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft TNT, I need to place gunpowder in the corners of the crafting grid, and sand in the middle. The first step is to move one gunpowder from slot 43 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 43 to slot 1 with quantity 1
